pr_title: Updates dependency versions, notably gRPC which has some changes

timeline.bodyText: a separate change would need to make the next version of dubbo not crash tests. this just avoids referencing a constant they later deleted
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt

timeline.message:
Updates dependency versions, notably gRPC which has some changes

* gRPC 1.22 census integration stopped propagating "method", so caused test drift
* gRPC also removed the parameter to withPlainText
* Dubbo 2.7.5 removed some constants, but tests fail. I removed use of the constants.

timeline.bodyText: diff didn't notice this file was just renamed with one method added.
timeline.author: codefromthecrypt
